title: Citi Teams Up with BabyCenter to Reach Moms During the Moments That Matter
summary: San Francisco and New York - Citi, the leading global financial services company, and BabyCenter®, the #1 pregnancy and parenting destination worldwide, have teamed up to release the "U.S. 2011 BabyCenter Cost of Raising a Child" report. BabyCenter tapped into its national member network to identify the financial challenges moms face, particularly in today's economy. More than 1,000 moms completed the survey, answering questions about how money impacts their decisions, from having children to prioritizing saving for retirement versus their child's college education and more. Citi sponsored the report as part of its ongoing efforts to provide insights that help women manage their finances as well as strategies and tools to help simplify their financial lives.
tag-1: Citi Teams Up with BabyCenter to Reach Moms During the Moments That Matter
tag-3: San Francisco and New York – Citi, the leading global financial services company, and BabyCenter®, the #1 pregnancy and parenting destination worldwide, have teamed up to release the "U.S. 2011 BabyCenter Cost of Raising a Child" report. BabyCenter tapped into its national member network to identify the financial challenges moms face, particularly in today's economy. More than 1,000 moms completed the survey, answering questions about how money impacts their decisions, from having children to prioritizing saving for retirement versus their child's college education and more. Citi sponsored the report as part of its ongoing efforts to provide insights that help women manage their finances as well as strategies and tools to help simplify their financial lives.
tag-4: "We know that mom is the Chief Everything Officer (CEO) and the health and well-being of her family's financial situation plays a central role not just in direct financial decisions, but in how she spends her time on social activities and 'me' time," said Tina Sharkey, chairman and global president of BabyCenter. "We're pleased that Citi has joined us in sponsoring this report, and we look forward to a continued relationship with them as they deepen their conversations with moms in all of the moments that matter."
tag-5: "Citi recognizes that moms wear many hats and wants to help simplify their busy lives," said Vanessa Colella, Head of Marketing, North America Consumer Bank, Citi. "BabyCenter's report helps identify the financial challenges and opportunities that moms need to prepare for while Citi provides the tools and expertise moms can use to stay on top of it all."
tag-6: Citi has long been committed to serving women and moms, as evidenced by its 11 years of offering Women & Co., a leading provider of financial insights and resources for women. In addition, Citi provides a variety of solutions that add value for moms and fit seamlessly into their lifestyles. These include its relationship with Manilla.com, a service that helps organize accounts online, and the new Citi Simplicity credit card, which offers a single rate across all purchases, balance transfers and cash advances, no late fees and no penalty rate.
tag-7: BabyCenter will soon also launch an updated version of its interactive online module, BabyCenter.com's Cost Calculator, which helps moms evaluate their families' specific financial variables. In addition, BabyCenter will engage women via social media channels on Facebook and Twitter and encourage them to share their own saving tips, as well as launch an original blog advice series called "Inside Your Budget."
tag-8: For more information about the report, please visit http://www.babycenter.com/child-cost.
